home.subline: Hi ! I'm Cédric, a freelance web developer. Let's take a coffee ! ☕️

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm a passionate developer and trainer, and I help my clients bring their digital projects to life. Whether it's creating an application, a website, or supporting beginners in development, I put my expertise at your service for simple, modern, and effective solutions.

ANKAMA.achievements: Development, publication, and maintenance of Krosmoz and Allskreen applications

HARFANG.achievements: Developed and launched the company's website

SAFEBEAR.achievements: Developed a POC (Proof of Concept) for Safebear's CEO

Build the Future.description: Studied online marketing and personal branding.

Javascript.description: Setting up client or server projects based on the Javascript ecosystem (React, Node.js, Express, TypeScript, Feathers, Three.js etc.) from project initiation to production.

ReactNative.description: Developing cross-platform mobile applications with React Native, from design to publication on stores.

CreativeDevelopment.description: Former sound engineer and music composer, I leverage my creative skills to design interactive and immersive experiences. My mastery of 3D creation tools (Blender, Three.JS) allows me to offer innovative and original solutions.
